short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to automate the search of things.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to search using multiple sites at once! Click the extension icon or use a keyboard command (default: Control/Command + Shift + S) and type the search term. A group of tabs with that search term applied in multiple websites will be shown.

I use this to search for news or stock information from multiple sources and I am finding it pretty neat!

ʕ •ᴥ•ʔ
